Posts.Content: Loomisgal wrote: one week out from 5-day treatment of external accelerated partial breast radiation and I have been slammed with severe exhaustion. I was fine the first couple of days. I can barely make it to the bathroom and it's been 3 days. My radiologist had said that most women get tired and may need a nap at the end of the day only. The pain in my breast ferls worse too. Has anyone experienced this kind of fatigue? I have to get back to teaching and I'm getting worried and depressed. Thanks so much for any input Dx 9/1/2017, IDC, Right, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- (IHC) Surgery 9/27/2017 Lumpectomy: Right Radiation Therapy 10/22/2017 3DCRT: Breast Surgery 5/6/2018 Reconstruction (right): Fat grafting Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Severe fatigue post accelerated partial breast radiation Loomisgal JKL2017
